comments.body: I merged this thanks! maybe as a small followup....can you explain in the docs _why_ one would need to do this, maybe a small example is in order?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +216,220 @@see :ref:`here<indexing.boolean>`

As of v0.13.1, Series, DataFrames and Panels have an equals method to compare if
two such objects are equal.
